notes: Interrupts the user's channeling spells upon cast.
Switches attributes as follows: Strength > Intelligence Intelligence > Agility Agility > Strength
Current health and mana percentages stay unchanged upon switching attributes.
abilities.description: There is no description for this ability.

additionalInformation: The Vambrace's initial status is always strength.
One Vambrace grants a total of:
name: Vambrace
